title: How Can I Repay Your Kindness?
alternative_title: 我该如何报答你的恩情 ; How to repay kindness ; How can i repay your kindness ; Ways to repay kindness ; How to repay debt ; 은혜를 뭘로 갚나
status: 我该如何报答你的恩情 ; How to repay kindness ; How can i repay your kindness ; Ways to repay kindness ; How to repay debt ; 은혜를 뭘로 갚나
description:
Description :
        After meeting an injured g** deep in the sacred Mountain Mill, the herbalist Alby saves him by bringing him back to his home, and tending to his wounds. O, the g**, is eager to repay the kindness as soon as possible. But what if the peculiar herbalist doesn't wish for wealth but... the g**'s body?
